summary: A loafer and a manicurist, both planning to marry money, meet and form an uneasy alliance.
cast: Carole Lombard|Fred MacMurray|Ralph Bellamy|Astrid Allwyn|Ruth Donnelly|Marie Prevost|Peter Allen|Murray Alper|Sam Ash|Herman Bing|Ralph Brooks|Sterling Campbell|Whitey the Cat|Albert Conti|Marcelle Corday|Nell Craig|William Demarest|Chauncey M. Drake|Bess Flowers|Edward Gargan|Rafael Gavilan|Phil Kramer|Mary MacLaren|Jerry Mandy|Nelson McDowell|Harold Miller|Harold Minjir|Ferdinand Munier|Edward Peil Sr.|Ira Reed|Francis Sayles|Jerome Storm|Fred 'Snowflake' Toones|Joseph R. Tozer|Harry Williams|S.H. Young
title: Candidata a millonaria
